fields.description: A collection of fields and their type for the template

templateUrl.description: Absolute URI to the rendering template

dataUrl.description: Absolute URI to the template JSON file

loc.description: Location of the template files inside the templates folder, relative to the templates folder

createdAt.description: Date at which the template was created

createdBy.description: Name of user who created the template

updatedAt.description: Date at which the template was last updated

updatedBy.description: Last user to update the template

pages.description: A list of page ids that utilize the template

revisions.description: A collection of revisions to the template
